sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react'
import { Accordion, Icon } from 'semantic-ui-react'



export default (props) => {
    const [state,setState] = useState(
        { 
            activeIndex: 0,
            index: {},
        }
    )

    const handleClick = (e,titleProps) => {
        console.log(titleProps)
        const newObj = { 
            activeIndex: titleProps.index,
            index: titleProps,
        }
        setState(newObj)
    }

    return (
        <Accordion 
        fluid 
        exclusive={false}>
            <Accordion.Title index={0} active={state.activeIndex === 0} onClick={handleClick}>
                Test Title 1
            </Accordion.Title>
            <Accordion.Content active={activeIndex === 0}>
                Test Content 1
            </Accordion.Content>
            <Accordion.Title index={1} active={state.activeIndex === 1} onClick={handleClick}> 
                Test Title 2
            </Accordion.Title>
            <Accordion.Content active={activeIndex === 1}>
                Test Content 2
            </Accordion.Content>
            <Accordion.Title index={2} active={state.activeIndex === 2} onClick={handleClick}>
                Test Title 3
            </Accordion.Title>
            <Accordion.Content active={activeIndex === 2}>
                Test Content 3
            </Accordion.Content>
        </Accordion>
    )
}
